meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>exclude</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to exclude</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: You would like to exclude your <reading>nose</reading> (のぞ) because you don't like your nose. Imagine your strong feelings about your nose as you decide to exclude it.
